patch 8.0.0455: the mode test may hang

Problem:    The mode test may hang in Test_mode(). (Michael Soyka)
Solution:   Set 'complete' to only search the current buffer (as suggested by
            Michael)

patch 8.0.0455: the mode test may hang

Problem:    The mode test may hang in Test_mode(). (Michael Soyka)
Solution:   Set 'complete' to only search the current buffer (as suggested by
            Michael)
